ai-patthana14.3:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.3:1.1_0: On the cause or condition there is no cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana14.3:1.1_1: causes and conditions to be associated with cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.3:1.1_2: Neither causes things associated with the cause, but not for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.3:2.1_0: causes and reasons to give rise to the teaching. Some causes and reasons.
ai-patthana14.3:2.1_1: Abandoning the teaching rooted in a cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.3:2.1_2: thoughts that are associated with cause and reasoned with the cause, and those without reason.
ai-patthana14.3:3.1_0: About the cause or condition for the sake of associated with cause and reason.
ai-patthana14.3:3.1_1: Neither things associated with cause and reasons. But those who don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana14.3:3.1_2: causes and conditions to be associated with cause or condition. And those things arise with the cause or conditioned by cause or reason.
ai-patthana14.3:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.3:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
ai-patthana14.3:4.1_3: You should get close to a question.
